Lightbox Code

A lightbox should be used when providing auxiliary information that needs to focus the all of the users attention.

Lightbox is centered and covers 10 columns of the grid. The lightbox should then contain a new 12 column grid. The lightbox goes full-width in mobile view.

Default Lightbox (Large)

If the content goes below the fold (on a desktop (fold considered 768) then use a new page.

{% include components/lightbox/default.html %}

Small Lightbox (under 350x350 pixels)

The lightbox fades in to the centre of the browser.

Lightbox using AJAX

This example allows the content of an external page be shown in a lightbox.
